verses.text: And \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w abode|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Shittim|strong="H7851"\w*, and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w began|strong="H2490"\w* to commit \w whoredom|strong="H2181"\w* with the \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*.

And they \w called|strong="H7121"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* unto the \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* of their \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*: and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, and bowed \w down|strong="H7812"\w* to their \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*.

And \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w joined|strong="H6775"\w* himself unto \w Baal-peor|strong="H1187"\w*: and the \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* against \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* all the \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and hang them \w up|strong="H3363"\w* \w before|strong="H5048"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* against the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*, that the \w fierce|strong="H2740"\w* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* may be turned \w away|strong="H7725"\w* from \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w Slay|strong="H2026"\w* ye \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* his \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that were \w joined|strong="H6775"\w* unto \w Baal-peor|strong="H1187"\w*.

¶ And, behold, \w one|strong="H0376"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w brought|strong="H7126"\w* unto his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* a Midianitish \w woman|strong="H4084"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, and in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, who \add were\add* \w weeping|strong="H1058"\w* \add before\add* the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*.

And when \w Phinehas|strong="H6372"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add*, he rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* from \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* a \w javelin|strong="H7420"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*;

And he \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* into the \w tent|strong="H6898"\w*, and \w thrust|strong="H1856"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w* of them through, the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w through|strong="H0413"\w* her \w belly|strong="H6897"\w*. So the \w plague|strong="H4046"\w* was \w stayed|strong="H6113"\w* from the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
And those that \w died|strong="H4191"\w* in the \w plague|strong="H4046"\w* were \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Phinehas|strong="H6372"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, hath \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* my \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* from the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, while he was \w zealous|strong="H7065"\w* for my \w sake|strong="H7068"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* them, that I \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w* not the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in my \w jealousy|strong="H7068"\w*.\f + \fr 25.11 \ft for…: Heb. with my zeal\f*
Wherefore \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* unto him my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*:

And he shall have it, and his \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him, \add even\add* the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of an \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w priesthood|strong="H3550"\w*; \w because|strong="H0834"\w* he was \w zealous|strong="H7065"\w* for his \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and made an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

Now the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w Israelite|strong="H0376"\w* that was \w slain|strong="H5221"\w*, \add even\add* that was \w slain|strong="H5221"\w* with the Midianitish \w woman|strong="H4084"\w*, \add was\add* \w Zimri|strong="H2174"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Salu|strong="H5543"\w*, a \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* of a \w chief|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* among the \w Simeonites|strong="H8099"\w*.\f + \fr 25.14 \ft chief…: Heb. house of a father\f*

And the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w Midianitish|strong="H4084"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* that was \w slain|strong="H5221"\w* \add was\add* \w Cozbi|strong="H3579"\w*, the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zur|strong="H6698"\w*; he \add was\add* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* over a \w people|strong="H0523"\w*, \add and\add* of a \w chief|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* in \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,
\w Vex|strong="H6887"\w* the \w Midianites|strong="H4084"\w*, and \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* them:

For they \w vex|strong="H6887"\w* you with their \w wiles|strong="H5231"\w*, wherewith they have \w beguiled|strong="H5230"\w* you in the \w matter|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Peor|strong="H6465"\w*, and in the \w matter|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Cozbi|strong="H3579"\w*, the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of a \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* of \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*, their \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*, which was \w slain|strong="H5221"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w plague|strong="H4046"\w* for \w Peor’s|strong="H6465"\w* \w sake|strong="H1697"\w*.
